title: elementary OS 7.1 Released with New Privacy Features, Improved AppCenter
description:
elementary OS 7.1 distribution is now available for download with new privacy and security features, as well as all the latest updates since elementary OS 7.0.

The post elementary OS 7.1 Released with New Privacy Features, Improved AppCenter appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
